SEARCH
Package Controller

Class SpecialItemCheckBoxesController

java.lang.Object
Controller.SpecialItemCheckBoxesController
public class SpecialItemCheckBoxesController extends Object
The controller class that manages interactions between the SpecialItemCheckBoxesPanel, SpecialItemQuantityInputPanel, and the user's selection of special items. This class handles actions performed by the user on the SpecialItemCheckBoxesPanel, such as selecting special items and creating new special items with specified quantities.
